it.polimi.deib.newdem.adrenaline.controller.actions.atoms.iteractions

Interface Interaction

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ActivatePupInteraction, AdditionalDamageInteraction, AssignWeaponInteraction, DischargeInteraction, GetTileInteraction, GrabDropInteraction, InteractionBase, MovmentInteraction, NewWeaponPaymentInteraction, ReloadActivationInteraction, ReloadPaymentInteraction, RequireDiscardInteraction, ResolveAdditionalDamageInteraction, RevengeEffectApplicationIneraction, SelectAdditionalDamagePowerupInteraction, SelectAdditionalDamageVictimInteraction, SelectDiscardWeaponInteraction, SelectNewWeaponInteraction, SelectPupInteraction, SelectReloadWeaponInteraction, SelectRevengePupInteraction, SelectShootWeaponInteraction

    public interface Interaction
    The simplest interaction possible between the system and a human.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void execute()
      Executes this interaction.
      boolean requiresInput()
      Checks whether this interaction requires user input.
      void revert()
      Reverts this interaction, restoring the game state preceding it.

    • Method Detail

      • execute

        void execute()
      throws UndoException
        Executes this interaction. MAy add new interactions on the context's stack.
        Throws:
        UndoException - user requested undo. Guarantees that the context's state at the moment of throwing this exception is the same as when this method was called.

      • revert

        void revert()
        Reverts this interaction, restoring the game state preceding it. Assumes that this is the last interaction on the stack.

      • requiresInput

        boolean requiresInput()
        Checks whether this interaction requires user input.
        Returns:
        whether this interaction requires user input
